name: Create shortened URL addresses from new Google Sheets spreadsheet rows via kutt
description: Every time you add a new URL address to your Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically shorten it via kutt and update the spreadsheet with the shortened version of the URL. This template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/11c3S2l9_7PhA0Ms64TIWP3KRDYQEq7-eDGEG2wu8y_s/edit?usp=sharing).
